container.heading: State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Specialized Health Care Services — Acute Inpatient Rehabilitation Services

para.text: In this chapter, the following documents are incorporated by reference.
The State Health Plan for Facilities and Services: Specialized Health Care Services — Acute Inpatient Rehabilitation Services.

annotations.annotation: Health-General Article, §§19-109(a)(1), 19-118, and 19-120, Annotated Code of Maryland

Regulations .01—.07 (Moratorium on Certificate of Need Application) adopted as an emergency provision effective August 1, 1985 (12:17 Md. R. 1696) (12:20 Md. R. 1921); emergency status extended at 12:26 Md. R. 2540; emergency status expired March 29, 1986

Regulation .01 (State Health Plan: Comprehensive Rehabilitation Services) adopted as an emergency provision effective June 10, 1987 (14:14 Md. R. 1565); emergency status expired November 10, 1987; adopted permanently effective January 25, 1988 (15:2 Md. R. 121)

Chapter, State Health Plan: Comprehensive Rehabilitation Services, repealed and new Regulation .01 under chapter, State Health Plan: Acute Inpatient Rehabilitation Services, adopted effective March 11, 1996 (23:5 Md. R. 379)
Regulation .01 amended effective April 16, 2001 (28:7 Md. R. 690)
Regulation .01 repealed and new Regulation .01 adopted effective December 23, 2013 (40:25 Md. R. 2069)
Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective March 17, 2018 (45:8 Md. R. 418); amended permanently effective May 21, 2018 (45:10 Md. R. 503)
